668950.name: Fantasy Grounds - Savage Worlds Necessary Evil Online Gaming (Token Pack)
668950.description:
This online gaming product contains miniature tokens of unique villains and monsters you can encounter in this exciting setting for Savage Worlds! Not only does it have a whole heap of villains, but you'll also get the V'sori, their troops, and even four vehicle cutouts on the same scale as the other figures!
This product contains 150 tokens for use with Necessary Evil. There are multiple tokens for all tokens (close-ups and full figure), and addition tokens for creatures of varying sizes.
File List: Necessary Evil
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds Adventure Edition ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
